statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 101 AND sale_date = '2021-05-30';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 10000 OR quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%ABC%' AND quantity >= 50;
DELETE FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount < 1000 AND revenue_date < '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM trends_data WHERE trend_name = 'Outdated Trend' AND trend_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM bookings WHERE hotel_id = (SELECT hotel_id FROM hotels WHERE hotel_name = 'Example Hotel');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
